targets.expr: sum by (instance, hostname) (rate(node_netstat_IpExt_InOctets{job="linux-servers"}[5m])) or sum by (instance, hostname, device) (rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{job="linux-servers",device!="lo"}[5m]))

sum by (instance, hostname) (rate(node_netstat_IpExt_OutOctets{job="linux-servers"}[5m])) or sum by (instance, hostname, device) (rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{job="linux-servers",device!="lo"}[5m]))

topk(10, sum by (groupname, hostname) (label_replace(rate(windows_process_cpu_time_total{job="windows-servers",process!="Idle"}[5m]) * 100 / on(instance) group_left() (count by (instance) (windows_cpu_core_frequency_mhz{job="windows-servers"}) or count by (instance) (windows_cpu_logical_processors{job="windows-servers"}) or count by (instance) (windows_cs_logical_processors{job="windows-servers"}) or vector(4)), "groupname", "$1", "process", "(.+)")))

label_replace(sum by (process, instance, hostname) (rate(windows_process_cpu_time_total{job="windows-servers",process!="Idle"}[5m])) * 100 / on(instance) group_left() (count by (instance) (windows_cpu_core_frequency_mhz{job="windows-servers"}) or count by (instance) (windows_cpu_logical_processors{job="windows-servers"}) or count by (instance) (windows_cs_logical_processors{job="windows-servers"}) or vector(4)), "groupname", "$1", "process", "(.+)")
